Interrupts.Name: Mummery
Interrupts.Trigger: The changeling is targeted by an ability.
Interrupts.Effects: Swap places with an ally in range 3. The attack targets that ally instead.

Actions.Name: Stab
Actions.Effects: Attack is a critical hit and deals +[D] if made against a blinded or slow character.

Actions.Name: Lesser Mortal Mockery
Actions.Description: The changeling transforms its physical form into a brief mockery of the closest foe. The effects depend on the foe's class.

ListedItems.Name: Stalwart
ListedItems.Description: The Changeling becomes sturdy until the start of its next turn.

ListedItems.Name: Vagabond
ListedItems.Description: The Changeling gains evasion until the start of its next turn.

ListedItems.Name: Mendicant
ListedItems.Description: The Changeling may end a status or blight affecting it.

ListedItems.Name: Wright
ListedItems.Description: The Changeling creates a height 1 aethershard object in range 3, then may teleport on top of it.

Actions.Name: Pocket Dust
Actions.Description: A foe in range 2 must save or become blinded or slow (Changeling chooses). The Changeling then gains stealth.

Actions.Name: Warped Reflection
Actions.Description: The Changeling's appearance ripples. While in this stance, the next time a character would use ability against the Changeling, they must first roll 1d6. On a 4+, they can use the ability as normal. On a 1-3, the ability's target changes to the character targeting the changeling, then this effect ends.
